title: Scientists race to study Indian coronavirus variant as cases explode
content:
1. Scientists race to study Indian coronavirus variant as cases explode  Fox News
  2. Triple-mutant Covid variant from India is now a potential global health risk  CNBC Television
  3. Covid-19 live updates: Indian coronavirus variant has now spread to almost 50 countries, says WHO  The Washington Post
  4. The Real Covid Variant Risk From India's Pandemic Wave Is Being Missed  Bloomberg
  5. Help India with its Covid-19 catastrophe  Bangkok Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
